title: Kanata Is Motivated!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Uoooh! Kanata is fired up~ Let’s do this~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Wow, Kanata-san is not sleepy for once nya! What are you doing~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, Rin-chan, perfect timing. Kanata was going to practice with my eyes wide open for my next live~! Will you join me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Of course nya! What kind of practice will we do~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm. If it’s with you, then probably dance. Kanata loves your cute and energetic dancing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Y-, you’re embarrassing me nya! Rin loves your dancing too. It’s so fluffy and just draws me in.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hehe~, Kanata is also getting embarrassed~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, Rin has an idea nya! Why don’t we just teach each other?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, that’s a great idea~. They say that teaching others can be a good check of your skills. Alright, Rin-sensei, Kanata will be in your care!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Leave it to me nya! Rin can’t wait to learn your dancing too nya, Kanata-sensei!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
